title: WCAS MATH 311-2-51 MENU:  Probability and Stochastic Processes

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value:
Continuation of MENU 311-1. Markov chains, convergence of random variables, random processes, renewals,
queues. This sequence covers more topics at a faster pace and in greater depth than does 310. Students may not receive credit for both 311-1 and 310-1, 311-2 and 310-2, or 311-3 and 310-3. Students may also not receive credit for 311-1 and 385, EECS 302, or STAT 320-1, 383. Prerequisite: 290-1,2,3 or 291-1,2,3 or consent of the department; 320-1 or 321-1 recommended.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value: Prerequisite: 290-1,2,3 or 291-1,2,3 or consent of the department; 320-1 or 321-1 recommended.

descriptions.name: Class Notes
descriptions.value: Students may not receive credit for both 311-1 and 310-1, 311-2 and 310-2, or 311-3 and 310-3. Students may also not receive credit for 311-1 and 385, EECS 302, or STAT 320-1, 383.
